title: 8.3 Master Challenge 3
question: Imagine you work for an astronomy organization that needs to process and analyze vast amounts of data from telescopes worldwide. The problem cannot be solved on a single computer due to both processing time and storage needs. Discuss how you would employ distributed computing to address these challenges. Explain in detail the benefits and potential difficulties that may arise during implementation.
